title: Fully updated and renovated beautiful century home- Front portion of a
posting_body: ['Beautiful, fully renovated 3 Bedrooms, 2 Bath, Avon Lake century home (Front Main part of a 2 family home) on a quiet dead end street close to Costco(1.3 miles), schools and other shopping.', 'Family Room has painted wood floors and a wood burning fireplace.', 'Modern Kitchen with stove, oven, dishwasher and fridge.', 'Cabinets include a wine rack.', 'Downstairs Bedroom has a brand new water proof wooden floor, fan and a room air conditioner.', 'Downstairs bath has a jacuzzi tub, and a hand held shower.', 'Living room has the same wood flooring, and a utility room with washer and dryer.', 'Upstairs 2 bedrooms are carpeted with window air conditioners and fans.', 'Upstairs bathroom has a shower.', 'A huge walk in closet is next to the bathroom.', 'Partial unfinished basement.', 'Huge yard, front and back', 'One car attached garage.', '2 Storage sheds.']
